column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Don't be fooled by the gimmicks
column2: the food is outstanding.  I would go here over Cafe Iberico
column3: any day.  Its authenticity is questionable
column6: and preparation that go into each tapas is top notch.  Again
column8: but are delicious and a great addition to the meal.  Good quality
column10: great patio for the summer time...the only complaints are that it could be a cleaner
column11: service could be tightened up a bit
column12: and the waits can be off-putting on a busy night.
